properties.description: A warm, welcoming space run by the community, for the community. Hot meals, food and hygiene pantry, warm coat rail, lovely community spirit. Support workers in daily, mental health support group, men's support group, SEND support group, bereavement support group, cooking on a budget lessons, coffee mornings, arts and craft group, knit and natter and lots of other activities. During the school holidays, we have fun activities for the children. All of our groups, food etc are free of charge.
properties.title: Community cafe and warm space

properties.address: townstal community hall, Dartmouth, Devon TQ6 9LJ
properties.description: A space that provides support to those that need it. We have a food bank, cafe with free refreshment, cake and during winter soup. We have every week free activates and during school holiday's most weeks we also have free childrens' sessions. Also we have local social housing landlord every week to help with issues and another organisation that can help with forms, hospital transport, care needed etc. we are a warm hub in winter and cool hub in Summer!!
properties.title: Friday hub Cafe & Food Bank

properties.address: South Brent Methodist Church, Devon TQ10 9AB
properties.description: Community coffee and space for conversation and friendship. Open to all
properties.title: Monthly Coffee Morning

properties.address: South Brent Old School Community Centre, South Brent, Devon TQ10 9BP
properties.description: The Hub is a welcoming community Space open weekdays from 9.30am until 12.30pm, with a variety of groups and activities running. However everyday anyone is welcome for a cuppa and a chat with each other or trained volunteers and staff. Apart from the rolling 'coffee morning' and games and crafts, we also offer form filling, cost of living signposting, IT support, device charging, hotdesking and from November soup or light lunch Tues-Fri with staff/vols. The space is an old school classroom has tables, chairs, desks, display boards and a small kitchenette. There are also weekend and evening activities run by our partner in The Hub Sustainable South Brent.
properties.title: The Hub

properties.address: The Valiant Soldier, Buckfastleigh, Devon TQ11 0BS
properties.description: A weekly community coffee morning organised by Buckfast Methodist Church but hosted by the Valiant Soldier Museum. Open to all, warm and friendly atmosphere. Closed 4/12/24 due to preparations for the Town Christmas Fayre, Christmas Day and New Year's Day, otherwise open weekly on Wednesdays
properties.title: The Valiant Soldier

properties.address: Totnes United Free Church, Totnes, DVN TQ9 5RP
properties.description: Pay what you can afford for a hot lunch buffet made with love from surplus and locally grown organic produce, some by us! More fresh deliciousness from local fields and orchards than you can shake a (celery) stick at. ðŸ™‚ The hot buffet is open from 12 noon until 2, on the first Saturday of every month, with organic teas, filter coffee and home made cakes served from 11. Live acoustic musicians are giving their time to entertain you, and it's free entry. All humans and service dogs welcome. We take cash and cards, and the venue is wheelchair accessible. It's also if you would like, an opportunity to find out more about Food in Community's solidarity box scheme, gleaning, community food groups, workshops and more.
properties.title: Totnes Pay What You Feel Cafe
